verbs.description: < p > [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: meet] [ARGM-PRP: for their historic summit] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: later this month] , they will be protected by men from one of the fiercest warrior tribes in the world - the Gurkhas of Nepal.</p >

< p > When U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un meet for their historic summit in Singapore later this month , they [V: will] be protected by men from one of the fiercest warrior tribes in the world - the Gurkhas of Nepal.</p >

< p > When U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un meet for their historic summit in Singapore later this month , they will [V: be] protected by men from one of the fiercest warrior tribes in the world - the Gurkhas of Nepal.</p >
